ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionConsent__.name: Communication Subscription Consent
ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionConsent__.description: The Communication Subscription Consent DMO represents a customer's engagement or communication channel preferences.

ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionId__c.description: A reference ID to customer’s subscription preferences for a specific communication.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Communication Subscription Consent DMO.

ssot__ConsentCaptureddateTime__c.description: The date and time consent was captured.

ssot__ConsentCapturedSourceName__c.description: The source where consent was captured.

ssot__ConsentStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to a user’s consent status.

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID to contact point for party, for example phone number or email address.

ssot__ContactPointConsentId__c.description: A reference ID to contact point where customer gives their consent.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__EffectiveFromDate__c.description: The date when consent form is in effect.

ssot__EffectiveToDate__c.description: The date when consent form is no longer in effect.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement channel type.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeConsentId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement channel consent type.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the communication subscription.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.
